natureInspiration.headline: A GIFT OF NATURE, ARTISTICALLY REFINED FOR YOUR SPACE
natureInspiration.paragraph1: At TheHomeCeramics, our design philosophy is rooted in nature's artistry. We meticulously craft premium porcelain tiles that capture the essence of marble, stone, wood, concrete, and textiles, bringing organic beauty and sophisticated textures to your living spaces.
natureInspiration.paragraph2: Fusing advanced technology with contemporary design trends, TheHomeCeramics | Seramik Porselen delivers innovative tiling solutions. Our diverse range of colors, patterns, and large formats (including 60x120, 30x60, 30x75, 30x90 cm) ensures aesthetic harmony and functional excellence for every architectural need.
natureInspiration.image1Alt: Elegant living space showcasing Hurrem porcelain tiles and sophisticated armchairs
natureInspiration.image2Alt: Artistic display of TheHomeCeramics's premium tile products - inicio_quien_somos.jpg
natureInspiration.image3Alt: Insight into TheHomeCeramics's design process or showroom view - inicio_quien_somos_1.jpg

PRODUCTS_DATA.name: PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 MATT (RELIEF) - BRILLER CHOCO RUBIC
PRODUCTS_DATA.description: Elevate your interiors with our PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 MATT (RELIEF) in the captivating Briller Choco Rubic finish. This large-format tile combines a sophisticated matte surface with subtle relief, offering rich texture and visual depth. Perfect for creating distinguished modern walls and floors, its warm chocolate tones and unique textured Rubic pattern provide a touch of contemporary elegance and lasting durability. Ideal for statement applications seeking a unique, high-end appeal.

PRODUCTS_DATA.name: PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 GLOSSY (RAINBOW) - GRACIA AQUA
PRODUCTS_DATA.description: Illuminate your space with the PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 GLOSSY (RAINBOW) in the mesmerizing Gracia Aqua. This large-format tile boasts a high-gloss finish that enhances its vibrant aqua hue, while the unique Rainbow effect scatters light for a dynamic, iridescent shimmer. Perfect for creating breathtaking feature walls, luxurious bathroom designs, or sophisticated commercial spaces, this tile offers a bold statement of modern elegance and unparalleled visual interest. Its durable porcelain construction ensures lasting beauty.

PRODUCTS_DATA.name: PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 CARVING GROOVE LIGHT
PRODUCTS_DATA.description: Experience tactile sophistication with our PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 CARVING GROOVE LIGHT. This large-format tile features an innovative "carving" finish that creates subtle reliefs and plays of light, adding depth and unique character to your walls and floors. The elegant and luminous Groove Light tone complements contemporary and minimalist designs, providing refined texture without overwhelming the space. Ideal for those seeking distinctive, high-durability porcelain for prestigious residential or commercial projects.

PRODUCTS_DATA.name: PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 MATT IN/OUT TERRAZA 1032
PRODUCTS_DATA.description: Transform your indoor and outdoor spaces with the PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 MATT IN/OUT TERRAZA 1032. This versatile large-format porcelain tile features a sophisticated matte finish, offering exceptional durability and a modern aesthetic perfect for contemporary designs. Its suitability for both indoor and outdoor applications makes it ideal for creating seamless transitions from interiors to terraces, providing a stylish and robust flooring solution that withstands the elements while maintaining its refined look. Enhance your living areas and terraces with this premium, resilient tile.

PRODUCTS_DATA.name: PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 STATUARIO GLOSSY - PEARL STATUARIO
PRODUCTS_DATA.description: Achieve timeless sophistication with our PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 GLOSSY STATUARIO - PEARL STATUARIO. This large-format tile beautifully replicates the classic elegance of Statuario marble with its luminous pearl-white base and delicate grey veining. The high-gloss finish enhances its luxurious appeal, making it perfect for creating stunning statement walls, opulent floors, and refined interiors in both residential and commercial settings. Elevate your space with the enduring beauty of marble and the superior durability of porcelain.

PRODUCTS_DATA.name: PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 BABYCON ROCCIA LUPO
PRODUCTS_DATA.description: Embrace the raw beauty of nature with our PORCELAIN TILE 60X120 BABYCON ROCCIA LUPO. This large-format porcelain tile captures the essence of Roccia Lupo stone, featuring intricate details and a rich, earthy palette. Its Babycon texture adds a subtle tactile dimension, perfect for creating sophisticated and grounding atmospheres in both residential and commercial projects. Ideal for those seeking a durable, stone-effect tile that blends modern design with timeless natural appeal.

COMPANY_INFO.name: TheHomeCeramics Atelier
COMPANY_INFO.missionShort: Providing discerning clients with exquisite, durable luxury porcelain tiles for transformative interior and exterior designs of unparalleled beauty and quality.
COMPANY_INFO.mission: Our mission at TheHomeCeramics is to empower discerning customers worldwide to create extraordinary spaces. We achieve this by providing the most exquisite, durable, and sustainably-sourced luxury porcelain tiles, blending innovative design with exceptional quality to turn every project into a timeless work of art.
COMPANY_INFO.expertise: With decades of collective experience in the high-end ceramics industry, TheHomeCeramics excels in sourcing, curating, and supplying premium porcelain tiles. Renowned for superior aesthetics, robust durability, and fine craftsmanship, our collection is meticulously selected. Our expert team actively monitors global design trends to offer tiling solutions that are both timelessly elegant and cutting-edge contemporary, perfect for a diverse range of prestigious architectural applications.

AboutPage.teamDescription: Our passionate team of seasoned designers, master artisans, and dedicated customer service professionals are committed to bringing your unique vision to life. We believe every space, grand or intimate, deserves the transformative touch of luxury that only the finest porcelain tiles can impart.

CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.name: 600x600mm Glossy Porcelain Tiles Catalog (V2)
CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.description: Discover our premium 600x600mm glossy porcelain tile collection (V2). Perfect for modern, luminous interiors, offering high-shine finishes and exceptional durability. Download for design inspiration and to explore styles and colors.

CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.name: 600x600mm Glossy Porcelain Tiles - Collection V1
CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.description: Dive into Collection V1 of our 600x600mm glossy porcelain tiles. Featuring a curated selection of vibrant colors and patterns, perfect for creating elegant and luminous spaces. Download now for inspiration and technical specifications.

CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.name: 600x600mm Endless Glossy Porcelain Tiles - Vol. 3
CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.description: Unveil the 'Endless' collection (Vol. 3) of our 600x600mm glossy porcelain tiles. Featuring continuous patterns for seamless, expansive designs. Download to explore sophisticated options for floors and walls that redefine luxury and space.

CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.name: 600x600mm Decore Mega & Glossy Decor Tiles Catalog
CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.description: Explore the Decore Mega series and our exquisite 600x600mm glossy decorative porcelain tiles. Find unique patterns and vibrant designs to create stunning feature walls and artistic spaces. Download now for a world of decorative possibilities.

CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.name: 600x600mm Bookmatch Glossy Porcelain Tiles Catalog
CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.description: Discover the art of seamless design with our 600x600mm Bookmatch Glossy Porcelain Tiles. Create stunning, continuous marble-like patterns for luxurious feature walls and floors. Download the catalog for inspiration.

CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.name: 600x600mm Statuario Glossy Finish Tiles Catalog
CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.description: Embrace timeless elegance with our Statuario marble-effect glossy porcelain tiles. This 600x600mm collection offers luxurious high-shine and durability. Download to view the full range and inspire your next project.

CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.name: Vibrant 600x600mm Multicolor Glossy Tiles Catalog
CATALOG_ITEMS_DATA.description: Unleash creativity with our 600x600mm Multicolor Glossy Porcelain Tiles. Explore a spectrum of vibrant hues and dynamic patterns for unique, statement-making designs. Perfect for adding personality and energy to any space. Download the catalog for dazzling inspiration.
